title: History of Ethiopia
content: Ethiopia is located in the Horn of Africa. It is a rugged, landlocked country split by the Great Rift Valley.

title: Intro to AI
content: Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence processes by machines, especially computer systems.

title: Photosynthesis
content: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants use sunlight, water, and carbon dioxide to create oxygen and energy.
